Uses of Package
suncertify.services

Packages that use suncertify.services
suncertify.db The database package provides the data access object (DAO) functionality. 
suncertify.gui The GUI package contains all classes relating to the Swing-based GUI, both the server GUI and the client GUIs (networked and standalone client). 
suncertify.rmi The RMI package contains the classes that provide network connectivity between server and client using RMI. 
suncertify.services The services package centers around the BusinessServices interface linking server and clients and introduced to enable lean clients, and also provides the model side of the application-wide model-view-controller (MVC) framework in the form of the ContractorManager. 
 

Classes in suncertify.services used by suncertify.db
Contractor
          Property-based representation of a database record, and also used for search criteria on the object level, as opposed to the string array-based record representation.
 

Classes in suncertify.services used by suncertify.gui
BookResult
          The result of an attempted book operation.
BusinessServices
          This business services interface is the one that is exposed to clients.
Contractor
          Property-based representation of a database record, and also used for search criteria on the object level, as opposed to the string array-based record representation.
 

Classes in suncertify.services used by suncertify.rmi
BookResult
          The result of an attempted book operation.
BusinessServices
          This business services interface is the one that is exposed to clients.
Contractor
          Property-based representation of a database record, and also used for search criteria on the object level, as opposed to the string array-based record representation.
ContractorManager
          Actually implements the BusinessServices interface designed to support lean clients.
ServicesException
          A checked exception signaled by the BusinessServices implementation to indicate a problem with the data access.
 

Classes in suncertify.services used by suncertify.services
BookResult
          The result of an attempted book operation.
BookStatus
          Enumerates the possible returned statuses of an attempted booking operation.
BusinessServices
          This business services interface is the one that is exposed to clients.

          Property-based representation of a database record, and also used for search criteria on the object level, as opposed to the string array-based record representation.
ServicesException
          A checked exception signaled by the BusinessServices implementation to indicate a problem with the data access.
